description:
Welcome to a wide world of wonderful audiobooks, ebooks, and things that aren’t books but are still pretty great.

Storytel is home to beloved stories, in-depth podcasts, and exclusive Storytel Originals.

Whether you listen or read, you’ll find the right story for any moment.

• Explore a massive library of stories in English and other languages
• Jump freely from story to story until you find one you love
• Build your bookshelf and get personalized recommendations
• Find what fits your mood, like crime, feel-good, or self-development
• Follow your favorite authors and series
• Browse and share reviews and reactions
• Try out that book your friend keeps talking about
• Discover what’s trending in the culture

LISTEN AND READ YOUR WAY

• Listen to audio stories on your iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and CarPlay
• Stream stories or download them for later
• Switch between listening and reading anywhere in a book
• Listen at your own pace: regular, sped up, or slowed down
• Set bookmarks and attach your thoughts as notes
• Drift off to dreamland with the sleep timer
• Spare those pretty eyes with Dark Mode
• See your stats and set a Listening Goal

KIDS MODE INCLUDED

• Let your kid find adventure in a space with just children’s stories
• Show or hide children’s books in your bookshelf
• Set your own pin code for parental control

HOW IT WORKS

Storytel is available in 25+ countries, including both local and international story treasures in different languages. A subscription gives you access to our ever-growing library of audiobooks, ebooks, and other stories.

In-app subscriptions will be charged via your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of the subscription period unless auto renewal is turned off in your iTunes account settings at least 24 hours before your subscription period runs out.

When a free trial is offered, we will ask you to add a payment method when starting the trial. But don't worry – if you cancel before the last day of the trial you won't be charged.

The content, languages and subscriptions available may vary by region. Some titles and offers shown above may not be available in your country or selected subscription plan.

Terms and conditions: https://www.storytel.com/documents/terms-and-conditions

Privacy policy: https://www.storytel.com/documents/privacy-policy

Questions? Feedback? Speak to a real person! Reach us at support@storytel.com

Welcome to 1000Kitap, the Social Network for Books!

Established in 2012, 1000Kitap aims to encourage everyone to read at least 1000 books. 1000Kitap recognizes the importance of books and reading and aims to spread this awareness to even more people. To access all the features of 1000Kitap, you can visit the website '1000kitap.com.'

With 1000Kitap, you can create your own world of books. You can have a personal book archive and view the archives of other people. Just like with other activities, reading multiplies when shared. By sharing what you read, you can inform others and benefit from their knowledge.

Poetry, novels, short stories, science fiction... You can find everything about books on 1000Kitap. 1000Kitap is your virtual library.

What can you do on 1000Kitap?

You can take notes on the books you've read.
You can take notes on the books you intend to read.
You can set reading goals and track their progress.
You can like books and see the books you've liked later.
You can make quotations from the books you've read or read quotations made by others.
If you're thinking of reading or curious about a book, you can search for it and see how many people have read it. Likes, comments, and reviews of the book can give you an idea.
You can rate books and articles.
You can write book reviews. You can also see the book reviews made by others. This way, people can decide what to read based on each other's reviews. Additionally, when reading a book, they can notice details they might have missed.
On 1000Kitap, the social network for books, you can share posts related to the books you've read. You can also like posts made by others. This is one of the most informative social networks. :)
You can write comments on people's posts and make new friends.
If you can't decide what to read, our book recommendations generated according to your profile's algorithm can help you. Our recommendations can change based on the books you've read and liked, the comments you've made, and your quotations.
You can meet other readers like you and talk about the books you've read.
1000Kitap is a social network application centered around books.
Is 1000Kitap Free?
1000Kitap is a free application that aims to promote reading.

Can I Read Books on 1000Kitap?
Currently, you cannot read books on 1000Kitap. However, you can access comments and experiences of people who have read the book you are considering.

We continue to work to make 1000Kitap more enjoyable for you. Our goal is to popularize reading and strengthen people's relationship with books. Remember, books are our truest friends. :)

1000Kitap Premium:
As a 1000Kitap Premium subscriber, you can use 1000Kitap without advertisements. Additionally, a symbol indicating your support for 1000Kitap will be displayed next to your name.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.1000kitap.com/hakkinda/gizlilik-politikasi

Terms of Use:
https://www.1000kitap.com/hakkinda/kullanim-sartlari

Kuran ve Meali uygulaması ile ücretsiz, reklamsız ve internetsiz bir şekilde Kur’an-ı Kerim ve tefsirini okuyabilir ve farklı mealleri karşılaştırabilirsiniz. Kuran okuma ekranında kaldığınız yerden devam edebilir ve sayfaları Fatih Çollak Hoca’nın yada Kerim Öztürk Hoca'nın kıraatinden dinleyebilirsiniz.

MATCH, CHAT, LOVE OVER BOOKS
Bookspace is the perfect match platform for book lovers to chat, meet and discover meaningful relationships over their shared love for reading:

- Meet people who enjoy books like you do.
- Swipe to find readers with similar taste.
- Spark conversations that start with books.
- Build bonds through thoughtful reading habits.
- Let your bookshelf speak for you.

OUR FEATURES

1) Match with Booklovers
Find people who share your favorite books and genres and match with others who have similar library. Build your personal bookshelf and expand your library as you connect with new match. Your library grows as you make new matching connections.

2) Share & Engage
Post your thoughts, book reviews, and personal stories. Join the conversation with others who are passionate about books and reading. Share your favorite quotes and discover new ones.

3) Discover New Books
Browse curated lists by genre and discover your next great read. Build your Library and keep track of your reading journey with our book tracker feature.

4) Book Tracker
Use our book tracker feature to keep a detailed reading log and organize your books into categories like "Reading", "Finished", and "Want to Read". Keep track of your books and never lose sight of your reading progress. With the book tracker, you can monitor how many books you’ve matched with.

5) Highlight Quotes
Capture and save your favorite quotes from books you love, and never forget those inspiring lines. Share your most cherished quotes with your matches.

6) Personalized Recommendations
Get personalized book suggestions by chatting with our AI Bot Olivia. As you build your library and track your reading progress with our book tracker, Olivia’s recommendations can increase your chances of matching with others who share your love for the same books.

HOW BOOKSPACE WORKS

Create Your Profile: Share your favorite books, genres, and reading preferences. Build your bookshelf and let others see your literary interests. Track your reading progress with our book tracker feature and highlight your favorite quotes.

Swipe & Match: Browse through profiles and match with fellow book lovers who share your reading habits. Keep track of the books you’ve read and those you want to read with your book tracker. Discover new matches along the way.

Chat & Build Connections: Start conversations, share book recommendations, and bond over your love for literature. Use the book tracker to discuss your reading journey with others.

JOIN THE BOOKSPACE COMMUNITY TODAY
Ready to find love over books? Create your Library and start matching with like-minded people who understand your passion for reading.

Kitappad`de kitaplarınızın herkesin keşfedebilmesi ve yaratabilmesi için güvenli ve rahat bir ortam oluşturma amacıyla paylaşırız.

Kitappad reklam içermez ve tüm içerikler ve kullanımlar ücretsizdir.
Kitappad kişisel verilerinizin korunması için tüm güvenlik önlemlerini en üst seviyede tutar ve sizden hiç bir kişisel verinizi talep etmez
Kitappad  kullanabilmek için bir eposta ve kullanıcı adına ihtiyaç duyar.
Kitappad’i kullanmak tamamen ücersizdir üyelik veya benzeri herhangi bir işlem için ücret ödemezsiniz.
Kitappad her geçen gün kendisini geliştiren bir altyapıya sahiptir ve taleplerinizi ciddiyetle dikkate alır ve en hızlı şekilde sisteme uyarlamayı hedefler.

Kur'an-ı  Azimüşşan'ın  basımı  için kurulmuş matbaa tesislerinde gerekli hürmet  ve  ihtimamla, özel  olarak yetiştirilmiş çalışanlarla neşredilen Tevafuklu Kur'an-ı Kerim, yine titiz  bir çalışmanın neticesi olarak iPhone' lara yüklenmek  için  Apple  Store'da yerini aldı.

Merhûm Ahmed Husrev Efendi’nin dünyâda ilk  defa  tevâfuklu  olarak  yazdığı 
orijinal nüshanın tıpkı basımı. Âyetberkenâr  yazıları net  ve  okunuşu kolay Kur’ân-ı Kerîm. Bu Mushaf ile hem Kur’ân’ı yeni öğrenen, hem de her yaştan insanımız artık rahatlıkla Kur’ân okuya-bilmektedir.

Temel Özellikler:

1- Tam sayfa Kur'an okuma hem yatay hem de dikey mod,
2- Yüksek çözünürlük, sayfalar hem yatay hem de dikey modda en guzel ve rahat orjinal yazımı bozmadan okunacak şekilde yerleştirildi, 
3- Kur'an sayfalarını seçmeli olarak 6 farklı hafızın sesinden dinleyebileceksiniz.
4- Hatim takip için 5 ayrı sık kullanılanlar imgesi,
5- Ana menüden istenilen sayfa, cüz ya da sureye gitme.
6- Secde ayetleri zemin renkli ve secde ayeti uyarılı
7- Hayrat Neşriyat Meali

Proğramın ipad güncellemesi yakında yayınlanacaktır. "Kur'an-ı Kerim - Ipad için" ismi ile App Store de yayınlanmaktadır.

Enjoy your favorite books on the go with a customizable reading experience and millions of best sellers, novels, science fiction, romance, fantasy, fanfiction and more.

FEATURES

Provides both paid and free ebooks including romance, werewolf/vampire, billionaire, marriage, action, adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, fanfiction, LGBT, classic, xuanhuan, wuxia novel & more original work. New stories are updated daily!

Marrying Her Was Easy, Losing Her Was Hell

Free books and special offers;
Free trial reading chapters and episodes;

Build up your own bookshelf and enrich your collections.

Save and preload your favorite stories and take them with you wherever you go, even when you're offline.

About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions
- Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.
- Coins Packs:  $20, $30, $50 and $100.
- Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
- Renewal: When you subscribe to check-in coins packs, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel your subscription. Subscriptions are automatically charged each billing period, whether monthly or another period, and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginning of each billing period.
- Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.
- Privacy Policy: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/EN/AppPrivacyPolicy.html?client_proid=1001&mt=1

No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/

All the books that you love. On the page or out loud. Anywhere you are.

Dive into a world of stories with Google Play Books! Explore millions of eBooks, audiobooks, comics and manga – all in one app.

Key Features: 
• Your library, anywhere: Enjoy books on your phone, tablet, computer or even in your car with CarPlay. Plus, you can download books to read offline.

• Organise with shelves: Personalise your digital library with custom shelves to categorise your books by genre, author or any theme that you’d like.

• Audio immersion: Enjoy a vast library of audiobooks with customisable playback speed, sleep timers and bookmarking to enhance your listening experience.

• Smart notes: Jot down notes while you read that sync with your Google Drive and can be shared for easy collaboration.

• Kid-friendly reading tools: Let kids explore word definitions or listen to books aloud. Note: Reading tools are available in English only.

• Immersive comics: Experience Bubble Zoom for a specialised comic and manga reading experience.

• Hands-free reading: Control your audiobook with your voice using Siri.

• Read your way: Customise your reading experience by adjusting the font, text size, brightness and more.

Millions of stories await on Google Play Books! Download now and start reading.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Discover stories that matter to you, from readers like you. Goodreads is the world's largest community of readers.

Find new and interesting books by browsing personalized recommendations based on books you've read and your favorite genres. See what your friends are reading, write book reviews, and keep track of what you want to read. Goodreads is a free service for book tracking, recommendations and reviews.

Use our barcode scanner the next time you are in a bookstore. Add the book in your hands to your "Want To Read" shelf and browse reviews before buying.

Features:

• Get personalized recommendations and discover new books based on your tastes.
• Goodreads Choice Awards: vote for your favorite books of the year and see the winners!
• Participate in the Reading Challenge!
• Book cover and barcode scanner!
• Keep a want-to-read list.
• See book reviews and updates from your friends.
• Discover new books and explore popular book lists.
• Rate and review books you read.
• Share notes and progress updates as you read.
• Recommend books to friends.
• Join online book clubs and connect with other readers.

By using this app, you agree to Goodreads’s Terms of Use (https://www.goodreads.com/about/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://www.goodreads.com/about/privacy).

• Litres: Books - a huge library in Estonian, English, Lithuanian, Latvian, Russian and other languages. 
• All the latest international bestsellers 
• The #1 reading app in the App Store 
• Over 10 million of happy customers
• The largest catalog — over 250,000 books 
Welcome to Litres! It’s a great way to read your favorite books on your iPhone or iPad.

 
For you:

· Access to 600,000 books and audiobooks in your favorite genres: fantasy, science fiction, business, Russian literature, DIY, romance, mystery, action, business, self-improvement, psychology, and much more.
· The first 20% of any book is free. What if you don’t like it? Read and choose which books to get.
· The hottest new releases. Be the first! Most new releases appear in the Litres catalog at the same time the paper book is released.
· Over 32,000 free books — read to your heart's content!
· Enter regularly-scheduled drawings and win valuable prizes for registered Litres users.
 
Special features:

· Your books are always with you — all the books you have purchased are available to you on all your devices (as long as you use the same account)
· Start reading on your iPhone, pick up where you left off on your iPad! All your bookmarks will be synced across all your devices and the Litres online reader (as long as you use the same account)
· The convenient search function lets you search for books based on various criteria. Do you only know the author's last name? Or are you trying to find a new fantasy novel to read? Our search function can help!
· You can sign up in a single tap using your social network account
 
To select a book:

· Read large free excerpts before you buy the book (up to 20% of the book)
· Read book reviews by other users or write your own
· Study the author's official web page with biographies, critiques, and easy access to series of books
 
While reading, you can:

· add the pages you need to your bookmarks
· see how many pages you’ve read and how many you have left
· fine-tune your reading experience for maximum comfort — adjust book background, screen brightness, and font size
· access your entire library in offline mode even when roaming or outside a network area (you will have to download the books beforehand)
· enable nighttime reading mode with a single button
  
If you like a book, you can:

· buy it with a single tap or put it in your cart and buy it later from your current device or a different one
· share information about the book with your friends on a social network
 
Get access to the best books and read online. Enjoy authors such as:

Boris Akunin, E. L. James, Alexandra Marinina, Sergei Lukyanenko, Darya Dontsova, Dina Rubina, Tatyana Ustinova, Roman Zlotnikov, Jojo Moyes, Tatyana Polyakova, George R. R. Martin, Vadim Panov, Sergei Tarmashev, Dmitrii Glukhovsky, Elena Zvyozdnaya, Stephen King, Max Frye, Maria Metlitskaya, Oleg Roi, Andrei Kruz, Yekaterina Vilmont, Donna Tartt, Zakhar Prilepin, Artyom Kamenisty, Dan Brown, Viktor Pelevin, James Rollins, Robert Galbraith, Vadim Zeland, Dmitrii Bykov, Alexander Mazin, Erich Maria Remarque, Anna and Sergei Litvinov, Natalya Zhiltsova, Dmitrii Rus, Jo Nesbø, Anna Gavrilova, Irene Kao, Viktoria Tokareva, Alexander Pushkin, Anton Chekhov, Fyodor Dostoevsky, Leo Tolstoy, Ivan Turgenev. Most popular books - Anna Karenina, War and Peace, Crime and Punishment, The Brothers Karamazov, Fathers and Sons.
 
Note: the Litres app may collect anonymous usage statistics.

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

The content in this app is for support purposes only and does not replace professional treatment!
All materials are created by child development specialists and pedagogues!
The human brain is an extraordinary structure made up of billions of neurons and completes its full development at the age of 21. Everything seen, heard, read, and experienced during childhood and adolescence affects many areas of the brain. However, the information that enters the subconscious is not always positive; some of it can lead to fears, anxieties, and emotional numbness without being noticed.
Harmonia Kids offers a safe space for children’s subconscious and includes special therapeutic stories that help heal emotional wounds, if any. These stories do not simply tell a tale; they touch the child’s inner world, guide them, and support their emotional development.
Content:
Therapeutic stories written and narrated by experts
Special stories that encode positive messages into the subconscious
Content that helps children cope with emotional challenges such as fear, anxiety, and lack of self-confidence
Psychology-based, age-appropriate stories for different developmental stages
Categories & Content:
0–3 Years: Secure attachment and basic emotional needs
4–6 Years: Imagination, self-confidence, and first social experiences
8–11 Years: Identity development, coping with anxiety, and emotion regulation
12–14 Years: Transition to adolescence, self-expression, and social relationships


Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://github.com/fatmamavis/HarmoniaKidsPrivacyPolicy/blob/main/HarmoniaKidsPrivacyPolicy.md

developer: BIR YUDUM KITAP YAYINCILIK ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Read and listen to the key insights of the finest books, podcasts and amazing short stories with Fabula.

Currently with more than 800,000 members worldwide, the audiobook app “Fabula” (a.k.a. “Biryudumkitap” in Turkey), now available in English! Audiobook summaries and beautiful short stories you can read and/or tune into in a lickety-split 15 minutes, just a click away on your cell, wherever and whenever you want. Bite-sized key ideas from the bestselling books!

CATCH UP WITH THE BOOKS YOU’VE ALWAYS WONDERED ABOUT IN A 15-MIN. PODCAST FORMAT

● Motivation, history, personal development, psychology, classics, and philosophy. Spot on nonfiction book summaries & reviews curated by academicians and professional editors.
● New books, audio documentaries, and microbooks are added every day. 
● Read or listen to hundreds of audiobook reviews and stories.
● Improve yourself in your business and academic life.
● It is a learning app that helps your self growth & self improvement. Entrepreneur books, business books, self development books, and more.
● Listen to audiobooks on the bus, train, car, plane, on the gym treadmill or on a walkabout around the neighborhood.
● Discover a new way of microlearning with our original content: Audio documentaries, original stories, and more.

READ OR LISTEN

● With the audiobook option, you can listen to books at the speed you want.
● You can customize your library by adding the books you choose.
● Check out our rapidly expanding archive of short stories for literature lovers.
● With advanced reading options, you can adjust font size and brightness, with day or night modes to make for a comfy read.

GET BOOK SUGGESTIONS AND DISCOVER NEW BOOKS

● Check out a list specially prepared amongst hundreds of book summaries to begin listening immediately.
● Discover new books with book recommendations prepared by our editors. It will help you develop a daily reading habit.

-------------------------------------------

METICULOUSLY PREPARED BOOK SUMMARIES: FABULA

● Read the book summaries prepared in plain language, selected for you from thousands of books and prepared by academics or editors.
● Read and listen to classic stories from notable personalities such as Franz Kafka, Edgar Allan Poe, Jack London, Leo Tolstoy, and Anton Chekhov.

DESIGNED FOR A BETTER READING EXPERIENCE

● We present a methodology involving hundreds of books in 50 categories converted into book reviews and FABULA chapter format.
● The book review, which starts with what we’ll learn from the book, ends with the book’s main message, plus some friendly recommendations.
● Reading FABULA gives you just the highlights of these books. We always recommend you read books in their whole form.

-------------------------------------------

HOW DOES IT ALL WORK?

Download the FABULA app to kick off your free trial. If you want, go along with our monthly or annual plan paid membership.

With an available Premium Membership option, you’ll have:

● Unlimited access
● The “My Library” feature
● The chance to read or listen to all the books on demand

If you don't need unlimited access, you can listen to the complimentary Book of the Day.

Terms of Use: https://www.biryudumkitap.com/app/tos.html
Privacy Policy: https://www.biryudumkitap.com/app/privacy.html

You can reach the Fabula team for your questions, suggestions, critiques and copyright infringement notices via support@getfabula.com

To contact the Turkish Biryudumkitap team, please email us: editor@biryudumkitap.com

Get ready for a whole new way to read eBooks your way! We've rebuilt the Kobo Books App from the ground up, focusing on what matters most: you and your love of the story, whether you read, listen, or are just dropping by.

Dive into millions of eBooks and audiobooks, all tailored to your reading life. Customize, sync, scroll seamlessly, and discover stories that stay with you, all in one powerful app.

Rediscover the joy of reading your way
Kobo seamlessly blends eBooks, audiobooks, and intuitive tools into your daily rhythm. From cozy nights to busy commutes, we keep your place, your pace, and your story alive.

Read and listen seamlessly
Customize fonts, enjoy Night Mode, set a sleep timer for audio playback, and experience natural-sounding text-to-speech for hands-free reading! Read Aloud available on select eBooks only.

Explore before you dive in
Our Guest Mode lets you browse books, save previews, and discover your next favourite read, all without any Kobo account required.

Pick up where you left off
Your bookmarks, highlights, and notes sync automatically across phone, tablet, Kobo eReader, or Kobo Web Reader, so your story always stays with you.

Designed for real life
From road trips with CarPlay to daily routines with our new Listen Bar, Kobo fits seamlessly into your day. Read in 13 languages including English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Turkish, and more.

Why Kobo?
Whether you’re into bestsellers, romance, thrillers, self-development, or audiobooks for your next run, Kobo’s intuitive app helps you rediscover the joy of storytelling.

Download the Kobo Books App and fall in love with reading all over again. Explore, highlight, review, read and listen your way, with full support for iOS accessibility features.

VAVEYLA'DA ONLİNE KİTAP YAZMA VE OKUMA DENEYİMİ
Vaveyla'da oku veya yaz. Kitap alıntıları yap, kitap özetleri çıkar ve kitaplardan özlü sözler kaydet.

SONSUZ VAVEYLA KÜTÜPHANESİ
Öykü, şiir, masal, roman ve hikaye gibi sevdiğiniz türlerdeki binlerce kitabı keşfetmenize veya kendi kitabınızı yazarak yaratıcılığınızı ifade etmenize yardımcı olur. 

YAZARLAR VE OKURLAR ARASI ETKİLEŞİM
Vaveyla okurları ve yazarları bir araya getiren bir sosyal medya uygulamasıdır. Vaveyla'da diğer üyeleri takip edebilir, kitaplara yorum ve beğeni yapabilirsiniz. Kitap okumanın, indirmenin ve yazmanın yanında, kitap alıntıları yapmak, kitap özetleri çıkarmak ve okuma listeleri oluşturmak da mümkündür. 

ÖZELLİKLER
1. Kitap yazarak büyük okuyucu kitlelerine erişme. 
2. Ücretsiz ve sınırsız olarak kitap okuma 
3. Kitap indirebilme ve çevrimdışı okuyabilme, 
4. Kitapları puanlayabilmek, yorum yapabilmek, Bültenler paylaşarak sosyal bir yazarlar ağına katılabilme
5. Kişisel profilini oluşturma ve diğer üyeleri takip edebilme. 
6. Grup içinde veya bireysel olarak diğer üyelerle mesajlaşabilme.  
7. Okurken müzik dinleyebilme
8. Okuma listeleri oluşturabilme. 

KOLAY KULLANIM
Vaveyla'nın ara yüzü kullanıcı dostu, özelleştirilebilir ve sezgisel olup, okuma deneyiminizi özelleştirirken yazarlara da güçlü bir yazma platformu sunar. 
Vaveyla ile kitapların büyülü dünyasına adım atın ve hayal gücünüzü keşfedin!

Inkspired is a platform for readers, creators, and authors to discover, write, and publish creative stories and book series for free.

Our mobile Inkspired App allows you to read stories online and offline, connect with your favorite emerging creators and authors, and write stories, novels, or microfictions to publish on our platform. It's free!

This new Inkspired mobile experience brings you:
- Read thousands of stories for free.
- Browse between genres, categories, and tags to discover new stories, authors, and narrative universes.
- Save stories in your library for offline reading.
- Engage with other readers and authors through a rich commenting system and announcements.
- Stay updated with in-app and push notifications.
- Create and manage your stories with chapters and short tales.
- Manage all the information about your stories.
- Create new chapters, and write in a beautifully designed editor. Even when offline!
- Publish your chapters now, or schedule them for future release dates.
- Read, write and manage microfictions.
- Participate in the latest writing contests.
- Manage your settings, notifications, and account preferences.
- Multilingual support.

app_name: One Page: Read Quran Every Day
description:
"One Page" is an application developed to gain the habit of reading the Quran. It reminds you to read the Quran every day. It marks every page you read and allows you to continue where you left off the next day.

It provides you an easy use with its simple and legible interface. You can easily reach the chapter or juz you want.

Your Complete Spiritual Companion 
Holy Quran  is designed for Muslims seeking a seamless, all-in-one app for their spiritual needs. Whether you’re looking for prayer time muslim reminders, salah guide for beginners, or Dhikr tracking, this app brings everything together in a simple and easy-to-use interface. Stay connected with your faith anytime, anywhere. 

Key Features 
Automatic prayer time alarm for all five daily prayers. 
Accurate qibla direction finder for wherever you are. 
Full holy book Quran text for easy reading and recitation. 
High-quality Quran mp3 full offline access to 114 surahs. 
Digital tasbih counter to track your Dhikr effortlessly. 
Morning and evening azkar reminders to keep you spiritually connected. 
Learn and reflect on the 99 names of Allah with meanings and benefits. 

Never Miss a Prayer 
With Holy Quran, you’ll always stay on time for your prayers. The app automatically sends alerts for salah time like Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, ensuring you never miss an important moment of worship. And with the accurate qibla direction feature, you’ll always know the correct direction to pray, no matter where you are. 

Read and Listen to the Quran 
The app offers both a full al Quran text for easy reading and a complete audio version of all 114 surahs. Whether you prefer to read or listen, you can engage with the holy book Quran in a way that suits your lifestyle. The Quran audio mp3 feature ensures you can access it even when offline. 

Find the Qibla Instantly 
No need to worry about finding the Qibla while traveling or in unfamiliar places. The app’s highly accurate qibla compass direction helps you locate the exact direction for prayer with just one tap, whether you're using it offline or online. 

Simplified Dhikr & Spiritual Growth 
Use the built-in tasbeeh counter to keep track of your Dhikr easily and accurately. Whether you’re at home, traveling, or on the go, this feature helps you stay connected to your faith through daily remembrance. Additionally, explore the 99 names of Allah with meaning to gain deeper insight into their significance and benefits, further enriching your spiritual journey. 

What Sets Us Apart? 
Holy Quran - Deeper Journey offers more than just the basics. We combine offline Quran audio, easy-to-use prayer alarms, and a highly accurate qibla finder in one simple app. It’s designed to be your comprehensive Islamic companion, offering everything you need for your spiritual growth without the hassle of switching between multiple apps. 
Download Holy Quran today and take the next step in your spiritual journey with confidence. All your spiritual tools—prayer time table, Quran reading, and Dhikr tracking—are now in one place, easy, accessible, and reliable. 

Your review is our appreciation. We will try our best to respond to all your contributions and improve the app base on your contributions. Download the Al Quran Sharif Prayer Time and rate 5 our app will be your Islamic companion.


Policy link: https://sites.google.com/view/pp-holy-quran/home
